mapper.select: SELECT R_NUM, R_ID, R_CODE, R_NAME, TO_CHAR(R_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND, R_RELEVEL, R_GROUPNUM FROM REVIEW WHERE R_ID = #{r_id} ORDER BY R_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE R_CODE = #{r_code} ORDER BY R_DATE DESC, R_GROUPNUM DESC, R_RELEVEL ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( R_NUM, R_ID, R_CODE, R_NAME, R_DATE, R_CONTENTS, R_RATE, R_RECOMMEND, R_RELEVEL, R_GROUPNUM ) VALUES ( R_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{r_id}, #{r_code}, #{r_name}, SYSDATE, #{r_contents}, #{r_rate}, 0, 0, R_SEQ.CURRVAL )
mapper.select: select * from REVIEW where R_RELEVEL = '0' ORDER BY R_GROUPNUM DESC
SELECT * FROM ( select * from REVIEW where R_RELEVEL = '0' AND R_RECOMMEND is not null ORDER BY R_RECOMMEND DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT * FROM ( select * from REVIEW where R_RELEVEL = '0' AND R_RECOMMEND is not null ORDER BY R_NUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
